mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `ic_main_user` WHERE `register_identify` = '开发者' AND `node_status` = 1 AND `user_status` = 1
SELECT `id`,`uid`,`ip`,`is_save`,`create_time`,`save_times`,`leavel`,`status` FROM `ic_login_history` WHERE `ip` = #{ip} AND `status` = 1 ORDER BY `leavel`,`create_time` DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `ic_login_history` (`uid`,`ip`,`is_save`,`create_time`,`save_times`,`status`) VALUES (#{uid},#{ip},1,NOW(),#{save_times},1 ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `uid`=#{uid},`ip`=#{ip},`is_save`=1,`create_time`=NOW(),`save_times`=#{save_times},`status`=1
